title: Cgpa
content: Can anyone tell what was the cutoff for scholororships

comments.body:
Please search this subreddit for more information. 

There is no "cutoff" since it depends on how your batch performs. The top x% (x depends on which scholarship) is determined entirely based on GPA.
Ya got it but what was the record of last year?
Can I know what was the record for last year
Ask on discord or wait for someone from the current 2nd-year batch to answer. Usually an 8.8+ is enough for MRD.

1st sem phy-  
       9.3 (mrd) 
       8.8(cnr)
1st sem chem -
       9.64(mrd)
2nd sem chem-
        9.25(mrd)
        8.8( cnr)
2nd sem phy - 
        9.33(mrd)

Idk the cutoff of crn for 1st sem chem and 2nd sem phy
